websiteDescription: This app is an unofficial tool that aims to make taxes the MRA charges employees in Mauritius easier to calculate and understand.

confirmation.title: Page Reload
confirmation.disclaimer: Changing the language requires a page reload. You will lose all your changes.
confirmation.question: Are you sure you want to reload this page?

errors.required: Error: Please fill in this field.
errors.stringMin_one: Error: Please enter at least {{count}} character.
errors.stringMin_other: Error: Please enter at least {{count}} characters.
errors.stringMax_one: Error: Please enter at most {{count}} characters.
errors.stringMax_other: Error: Please enter at most {{count}} characters.
errors.numberGTE: Error: Please enter a number greater than or equal to {{count}}.
errors.numberGT: Error: Please enter a number greater than {{count}}.
errors.numberLTE: Error: Please enter a number less than or equal to {{count}}.
errors.numberLT: Error: Please enter a number less than {{count}}.
errors.numberInvalid: Error: Please enter a valid number.
errors.formContainsErrors: Please fix the errors in the form.
